paper_abstract: In this paper, we consider constrained multicriteria continuous location problems in two-dimensional spaces. In the literature, the continuous multicriteria location problem in two-dimensional spaces has received special attention in the last years, although only particular instances of convex functions have been considered. Our approach only requires the functions to be strictly quasiconvex and inf-compact. We obtain a geometrical description that provides a unified approach to handle multicriteria location models in two-dimensional spaces which has been implemented in MATHEMATICA. (c) 2006 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Quasiconvex constrained multicriteria continuous location problems: Structure of nondominated solution sets
